message: Let's split the money 60/40. This gives us both a good portion.
Your previous offer wasn't fair to me. Let's be reasonable, this split accounts for the time value of money.
Bob, let's be realistic.  We both lose if this drags on. I'm offering a bit more than last time, but it's the best you'll get.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Accept this offer and we both walk away with something.  Otherwise, we're both just losing money.
